docs.text: KPN Public GitHub pages ¶ The KPN GitHub pages are a portal to expose and document open source projects that are maintained by KPN. You can access these pages on https://kpn.github.io/. Work in progress ¶ These pages are still work in progress but they should soon be up and running Contributing to these pages ¶ These pages are generated using Jekyll as preferred by GitHub . Anybody is free to contribute and improve these pages by creating a pull request to this repository. Workflow ¶ Fork this project to your account. Create a branch for the change you intend to make. Make your changes to your fork. Send a pull request from your fork’s branch to the master branch of this project. Adding new projects ¶ New open source projects should always be added to these pages. Testing locally ¶ You can test your changes locally by running a development server:: $ jekyll serve --livereload LICENSE ¶ Copyright 2018 KPN N.V. Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

docs.text: The KPN GitHub pages are a portal to expose and document open source projects that are maintained by KPN. You can access these pages on https://kpn.github.io/.

docs.text: These pages are generated using Jekyll as preferred by GitHub . Anybody is free to contribute and improve these pages by creating a pull request to this repository.
docs.title: Contributing to these pages

docs.text: Fork this project to your account. Create a branch for the change you intend to make. Make your changes to your fork. Send a pull request from your fork’s branch to the master branch of this project.
docs.title: Workflow

docs.text: New open source projects should always be added to these pages.
docs.title: Adding new projects

docs.text: You can test your changes locally by running a development server:: $ jekyll serve --livereload
